title: Water, water, everywhere
creator_credit: Marc Beaudet, ONF | NFB and Gilles Blais
brief_description: An underwater close up of the death of a trout in polluted water. A film for conservationists and all people concerned about the preservation of the natural world and the creatures that inhabit it.
creator_credit_for_label: Marc Beaudet, ONF | NFB and Gilles Blais
